columns.comment: Generated unique id for enduser table.
columns.name: enduser_id

columns.comment: Username of the enduser on the specific gateway denoted by the proxy user having gateway_id
columns.name: username

columns.comment: User id of the enduser on the specific gateway denoted by the proxy user having gateway_id
columns.name: local_username_id

columns.comment: Foreign key to gateway.proxy_person_id, denotes the proxy user that runs jobs on resources at the behest of a gateway.
columns.name: gateway_id

columns.comment: Last modified date for this record.
columns.name: last_modified
